item.title: Install Windows Subsystem for Android
item.description: Install WAS Upgrade to windows 11 latest version (GA, Preview, Evaluation etc). Upgrade microsoft appstore to latest version Setting→Time & Language → Langage & Region → Region: USA Open AppStore, Search Amazon Appstore and install Amazon Appstore. it will install Windows Subsystem for Android as well. Install applications as user using Amazon AppStore Register as Amazon US user
